alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 11:31AM PST until February 15 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph could result in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 9 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions alongside reduced visibility with blowing and drifting snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
